Class Encounter

  • java.lang.Object
    • Event
      • Encounter

  • public class Encounter
extends Event
    Handles combat system. Most encounters are generated dynamically during game, and have scalling enemy strenght, as well as randomized rewards (to be implemented). Special not scaled encounter are defined inside database class.

      • ai_mood

        Abilities ai_mood()
        Chooses which ability ai will use. Selection is based on: what player and enemy did next turn, if player or enemy are stunted / have low hp. Selection is somewhat randomized. Behavior of enemy have huge effect.
        Returns:

      • timers

        public void timers()
        Function lowers cooldown timers after each turn

      • dots_and_effects

        void dots_and_effects()
        Function calculates outcome of damage over time effects (Bleeds) or healing over time effects (regeneration)

      • update_status

        void update_status()
        Function updates gui elements after each turn, or if combat is over

      • run

        public int run(int s)
        This function handles everything that happens each turn.
        Parameters:
        s - Player skill(position in array)
        Returns:
        returns outcome of battle (0 - nothing happend, -1 lose, 1 player win, 2 player run away)
